revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Pattern Bush |image = [[File:Pattern Bush.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of Pattern Bush. |tokens = 43,000 |location = Sevii Island 6, northwest of Water Path. }} '''Pattern Bush''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 500,000 HP.
== Tables des rencontres == === Rencontres sauvages ===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Spinarak.png|40px]] Spinarak || [[File:Youngster.png|40px]] Youngster Cordell || [[File:Farfetch'd.png|40px]] Farfetch'd, [[File:Farfetch'd.png|40px]] Farfetch'd |- | [[File:Pokémon Breeder (female).png|40px]] Pokémon Breeder Bethany || [[File:Chansey.png|40px]] Chansey |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Ledyba.png|40px]] Ledyba || [[File:Bug Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher Garett || [[File:Heracross.png|40px]] Heracross |- | [[File:Lass.png|40px]] Lass Joana || [[File:Snubbull.png|40px]] Snubbull |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Caterpie.png|40px]] Caterpie || [[File:Youngster.png|40px]] Youngster Nash || [[File:Weepinbell.png|40px]] Weepinbell, [[File:Weepinbell.png|40px]] Weepinbell, [[File:Victreebel.png|40px]] Victreebel |- | [[File:Bug Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher Vance || [[File:Venonat.png|40px]] Venonat, [[File:Venomoth.png|40px]] Venomoth |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Weedle.png|40px]] Weedle || [[File:Ruin Maniac.png|40px]] Ruin Maniac Layton || [[File:Sandslash.png|40px]] Sandslash, [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix, [[File:Sandslash.png|40px]] Sandslash |- | [[File:Picnicker.png|40px]] Picnicker Marcy || [[File:Paras.png|40px]] Paras, [[File:Paras.png|40px]] Paras, [[File:Parasect.png|40px]] Parasect |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Metapod.png|40px]] Metapod || [[File:Bug Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher Jonah || [[File:Yanma.png|40px]] Yanma, [[File:Beedrill.png|40px]] Beedrill, [[File:Yanma.png|40px]] Yanma, [[File:Beedrill.png|40px]] Beedrill |- | [[File:Lass.png|40px]] Lass Dalia || [[File:Hoppip.png|40px]] Hoppip, [[File:Hoppip.png|40px]] Hoppip, [[File:Skiploom.png|40px]] Skiploom, [[File:Skiploom.png|40px]] Skiploom |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Kakuna.png|40px]] Kakuna || [[File:Pokémon Breeder (female).png|40px]] Pokémon Breeder Allison || [[File:Clefairy.png|40px]] Clefairy, [[File:Clefairy.png|40px]] Clefairy, [[File:Clefable.png|40px]] Clefable |- | [[File:Camper.png|40px]] Camper Riley || [[File:Pinsir.png|40px]] Pinsir, [[File:Heracross.png|40px]] Heracross |}

===Table du taux d'obtention avec Perte de bonus===
After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
